items.text: length on leg stump, tapped to mid-on on from the crease
items.shortText: Kumar to Liton Das, no run

items.text: short of a length and cramping him on off stump. Opens the face and runs it straight to backward point
items.shortText: Kumar to Liton Das, no run

items.text: length on off stump, opens the face as he blocks on the front foot
items.shortText: Kumar to Liton Das, no run

items.text: gorgeous. It's that time again, when we talk about how good this guy looks in the hope he doesn't step out and chuck his bat on the stumps next ball. Stays back in the crease, allows the short ball to come on and despite its steepness, gets on top of it and guides it to the square leg boundary with a hook
items.shortText: Kumar to Liton Das, FOUR runs

items.text: length ball into the pads, stays tall and tickles it fine
items.shortText: Kumar to Liton Das, FOUR runs

items.text: another pleasing shot. Punched straight to cover though. Feet a little bit still against this length ball outside off, but he's right behind it and offers a high elbow
items.postText: This is Bangladesh's highest opening partnership of the tournament already.
items.shortText: Kumar to Liton Das, no run

items.text: full on off stump, jammed back to the bowler off the front foot
items.shortText: Chahal to Mehidy Hasan Miraz, no run

items.text: full on off stump, looks to push it into the covers with the turn but this slides straight on. Rolls back down the pitch off the inside edge
items.shortText: Chahal to Mehidy Hasan Miraz, no run

items.text: length on off stump, pushed towards long-off with the turn. Chahal gets in the way
items.shortText: Chahal to Mehidy Hasan Miraz, no run

items.text: inside edge past off stump. Full ball sliding outside off. He looks to slice it for one that bounce, but it stays low. Deflected to short fine off Dhoni's pad
items.shortText: Chahal to Mehidy Hasan Miraz, 1 run

items.text: tossed up on leg stump, gets to the pitch and chips it to deep midwicket's left. Jadeja there will only allow one
items.shortText: Chahal to Liton Das, 1 run

items.text: length on leg stump, tapped through square leg
items.shortText: Chahal to Mehidy Hasan Miraz, 1 run

items.text: slower ball at a length wide outside off. He looks to chuck the bat at this but it trickles to point off the under-edge
items.shortText: Bumrah to Mehidy Hasan Miraz, no run

items.text: offcutter at a length on off stump. Blocked on the front foot
items.shortText: Bumrah to Mehidy Hasan Miraz, no run

items.preText: Tapan : "We do not have great memories when Bumrah had an occasional bad day at the office. * Champions Trophy final 2017 VS Pakistan, WT20 2016 SF vs West Indies...Hope today is not the day"
items.text: length ball into the pads, uses the angle to run it down to fine leg
items.postText: Desi: "I know I am crossing limits here, but Liton Das reminds me of Rohit Sharma. Elegant when playing, but horror to see his shot while getting out."
items.shortText: Bumrah to Mehidy Hasan Miraz, 1 run

items.text: slower ball coming in at off stump on a length. Defends with soft hands
items.postText: Dhoni had said that one of the things India's seamers had failed to do last match was adapt to bowling a short of a length strategy. Looks like Bumrah has gone for that straight away and added a bit of spin on it.
items.shortText: Bumrah to Liton Das, no run

items.text: lofted over wide mid-on. Superb batting. It's a regular paced delivery from Bumrah so there is climb on it. Back of a length and angled inwards. Liton uses all of that as he steps down and uses his hands to swipe from under the ball
items.shortText: Bumrah to Liton Das, FOUR runs

items.text: length on the pads, tapped into the leg side with soft hands
items.shortText: Bumrah to Liton Das, 1 run

items.text: length on off stump, punched down the pitch on the up
items.shortText: Chahal to Liton Das, no run

items.text: swept over the deep backward square boundary with the pace. Full ball down leg side, he shuffles into the off and takes on the part of the field where there's no protection. Bit of a ramp in the end
items.shortText: Chahal to Liton Das, SIX runs

items.text: full on middle stump, tapped towards mid-on
items.shortText: Chahal to Liton Das, 1 run

items.text: full on middle stump, gets to the pitch and nudges it wide of deep midwicket off the front foot. That is fifty for Bangladesh's new opening pair
items.shortText: Chahal to Mehidy Hasan Miraz, 2 runs

items.text: full on leg stump, flicked past square leg
items.shortText: Chahal to Mehidy Hasan Miraz, 1 run

items.text: pumps it over wide long-on! Oh he's doing whatever he wants today. This is lobbed up at leg stump, get clears the front leg and swings cleanly to clear the boundary.
items.postText: He's equaled his highest score now. Ridiculous that it is only 41 in the first place.
items.shortText: Chahal to Liton Das, SIX runs

items.preText: And a sign that India are panicking - Chahal has bowled more Powerplay overs today than he had in his ODI career before this.
items.text: length outside off, driven on the rise to cover
items.shortText: Bumrah to Mehidy Hasan Miraz, no run
